properties.name: specialization
properties.description: The specific field or area of practice for the doctor (e.g., Cardiologist, Orthopedic).

properties.name: yearsOfExperience
properties.description: The number of years the doctor has been practicing.

properties.name: clinic
properties.description: The clinic or hospital where the doctor practices.

classes.description: A healthcare facility where patients receive treatment.

properties.name: clinicName
properties.description: The name of the clinic or hospital.

properties.name: location
properties.description: The location or address of the clinic.

properties.name: operationalHours
properties.description: The hours during which the clinic is operational.
